typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> MoviesDB
MoviesDB filter(toInteger(year) >= 1910 && toInteger(year) <=2010 && rlike(genres, 'Comedy')) ~> Filteryrs
Filteryrs aggregate(groupBy(year),
	aggregatetoyear = avg(toInteger(Rating))) ~> AggregateComedyRatings
AggregateComedyRatings sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
